dcat_ap_format.description:
DCAT format specifier for the catalog export.
`dcat_ap_*` formats are only available upon activation.

include_exports.description: Sets the datasets exports exposed in the DCAT export. By default, all exports are exposed.

use_labels_in_exports.description: If set to `true`, this parameter will make distributions output the label of each field rather than its name. This parameter only applies on distributions that contain a list of the fields in their output (e.g., CSV, XLSX).
